ngos.name: Sahodari Foundation
ngos.description: India's first transgender-led organization focusing on education, entrepreneurship, and creative arts for transgender individuals.

ngos.name: TWEET Foundation
ngos.description: A transgender-led community-based organization supporting transgender persons through advocacy, skill training, and employment opportunities.

ngos.name: Smile Foundation – Swabhiman
ngos.description: Empowering women through education, healthcare, nutrition, and economic self-reliance in underprivileged communities.

ngos.name: Akshara Centre
ngos.description: A Mumbai-based organization promoting gender equality, women's safety, and empowerment through education and digital awareness.

ngos.name: SAATHII (Solidarity & Action Against The HIV Infection in India)
ngos.description: Works to strengthen healthcare access, rights, and social inclusion for LGBTQIA+ individuals, especially transgender and hijra communities.

ngos.name: Webpulse Foundation
ngos.description: Provides women with access to education, vocational training, and healthcare to promote economic independence and social equality.

ngos.name: Naz Foundation
ngos.description: A Delhi-based NGO advocating for sexual health, HIV/AIDS awareness, and equal rights for women and LGBTQIA+ individuals.

ngos.name: Udyogini
ngos.description: Working across eight states, Udyogini supports rural & tribal women with livelihood, skills, market linkages and financial inclusion.
ngos.location: D-17, Basement, Saket, New Delhi, India

ngos.name: Mitr Trust
ngos.description: Works for LGBTQIA+ persons: safe shelters for transgender persons, skills & rights advocacy.

ngos.name: Geetanjali Foundation
ngos.description: Association that supports trans-sexual, non-binary persons and persons with disability, via training, advocacy and empowerment.

ngos.name: SAFA India
ngos.description: Empowers urban women & youth through socio-economic interventions in Hyderabad, emphasising livelihoods for women from slums.

ngos.name: Artha Samriddhi
ngos.description: Women-focused NGO creating safe spaces for underserved women, focusing on financial literacy, skill development and independence.

ngos.name: Centre for Equity and Inclusion (CEQUIN)
ngos.description: Delhi-based organisation working on women's rights, gender-based violence, public space safety and economic inclusion.

ngos.name: SheSays India
ngos.description: Mumbai-based NGO promoting gender equality, women's rights, online & offline, including redressal mechanisms for gender-based violence.

ngos.name: Orinam
ngos.description: Chennai-based collective working for alternate sexualities and gender identities; supports queer, transgender folks, their families and community in Tamil Nadu.

ngos.name: DEAR India Ministries (DEAR Trust)
ngos.description: Working throughout India to empower transgender persons through education, vocational training, healthcare & rehabilitation.

ngos.name: Triveni Samaj Vikas Kendra (TSVK)
ngos.description: Mumbai-based NGO working for transgender/hijra community in Mumbai/Thane, focusing on awareness, rights, health, inclusion.
ngos.location: Malad/ Malwani area, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

ngos.name: Nishtha
ngos.description: Established 1975 in West Bengal: empowering women and girls with rights, equal opportunities and dignity.

ngos.name: Avani
ngos.description: Supports children, women and communities in rural & migrant contexts; rescues and rehabilitates, provides skill-training for women.

ngos.name: WINGS Foundation (Women in Need Given Support)
ngos.description: Works across several states (Maharashtra, Karnataka, Gujarat, MP, UP, Jharkhand, Bihar) focusing on women's empowerment, health, livelihood and education.

ngos.name: SHE (Self Help Enterprise) Foundation
ngos.description: Rural Bengal focussed NGO reviving traditional skills among women (Kantha quilt etc) and empowering them through livelihood, education and dignity.

ngos.name: Centre for Social Research (CSR)
ngos.description: Delhi-based NGO working for women's rights, building gender-equitable society, violence-free world via research, advocacy and services.

ngos.name: Humans For Humanity
ngos.description: NGO educating women and girls on menstrual health and hygiene, reached millions of women in rural India in multiple states.

ngos.name: Maher
ngos.description: UN-registered interfaith organisation providing shelter, support and self-help groups for destitute women, men, children; focuses strongly on women's empowerment and safety.
ngos.location: Vadhu Budruk, near Pune, Maharashtra, India

ngos.name: DhiEva
ngos.description: Registered in 2023 in Kerala: promotes mental wellness, social equity, quality education and provides counselling support for women, children & LGBTQ individuals.
ngos.location: Room 101, KSM Arcade, DPO Road, Palakkad-14, Kerala, India

ngos.name: AJSA India – Gender Justice Program
ngos.description: Development organisation that champions gender equality, women's and girls' health & rights with legal support and community outreach.

ngos.name: Wajood Project (via Alliance India)
ngos.description: Community-led initiative for transgender & hijra populations across multiple states providing HIV & sexual health services, rights awareness and violence prevention.
ngos.location: Multiple states in India (Delhi, Gujarat, AP/TS, Karnataka)
